value.name: The Latest: Second night of protest over LAPD shooting

value.name: Protesters block Los Angeles traffic over deadly police shooting of teen
value.description: Protesters in Los Angeles blocked traffic for a second straight night to express outrage over the deadly police shooting of a black teenager. The LAPD says 18-year old Carnell Snell Jr. was shot ...

value.name: Analyzing officer involved fatalities in South LA, Pasadena, El Cajon, Sacramento
value.description: In South LA on Saturday, LAPD officers shot fatally an 18-year-old black man, Carnell Snell Jr., after a car chase. Police have said a weapon was found near the scene. Snell's family has said ...
